caption:
Come with me to one of the best bars in London 🍸✨ 
 
@a_bar_with_shapes_for_a_name_ has teamed up with @greygoose to redefine the vodka martini cocktail ~ introducing the Tiny ‘Tini. 

A trio of perfectly chilled, miniature vodka martini cocktails, each crafted for a unique flavour experience: 

🔶 KiKi – Sharp, fresh, slightly dry 
🔵 Bouba – Smooth, mellow, subtly sweet 
🟥 Control – The martini benchmark 

Inspired by the KiKi & Bouba theory, this flight proves that shape influences flavour ~ and that great things do come in small packages. 

Sip, savour & switch between styles and tell us your favourite! Available until the end of April! 

ad / Drink Responsibly 

#TinyTinis #GreyGoose
